browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/29.0.1547.62 Safari/537.36

visible_files.cyber-dojo.sh:
rm *.class
javac -cp .:`ls *.jar | tr '\n' ':'`  *.java   
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp .:`ls *.jar | tr '\n' ':'` org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
visible_files.instructions:
Factorize a positive integer number into its prime factors.

For example:

	 2 -> [2]
	 3 -> [3]
	 4 -> [2,2]
	 6 -> [2,3]
	 9 -> [3,3]
	12 -> [2,2,3]
	15 -> [3,5]
